name: Chicken Teriyaki Bowl
description: Grilled chicken glazed with teriyaki sauce served over steamed rice.

name: Beef Gyudon
description: Thin sliced beef simmered with onion in a savory sweet sauce.

name: Vegetable Tempura
description: Crispy tempura assortment of seasonal vegetables.

name: Miso Soup
description: Classic miso soup with tofu, seaweed, and green onions.

name: California Roll
description: Imitation crab, avocado, and cucumber rolled in sushi rice.

name: Spicy Tuna Roll
description: Fresh tuna mixed with spicy mayo wrapped in rice and seaweed.
